thread.title: Nike’s Zoom Flight Bonafide Gets a Multicolor Makeover
thread.title_full: Nike’s Zoom Flight Bonafide Gets a Multicolor Makeover

author: Contributor
title: Nike’s Zoom Flight Bonafide Gets a Multicolor Makeover
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: Zoom Flight Bonafide “Multicolor”
Key Features: Flyknit constructed upper in vibrant shades of red, green, yellow and blue. An extended sock-like collar and zippers on the heel promote sufficient comfort, as well as easy slip-on accessibility. 3M reflective carbon fiber inserts are applied on the midsole unit.
Release Date: Summer 2017
Price: TBA
Availability : Nike 
Editor’s Notes: Inspired by the classic Nike Air Zoom Flight 95, and designed by Ben Kirschner (the man behind the Nike SF-AF1 ), this modernized iteration was first seen in the recent 5 Decades of Basketball collection that debuted in February.
Check out the Air Jordan IV “ Motorsport ” which is releasing this weekend.
